overview: Two friends, Konstantinos and Nikos, explore an abandoned hotel called Aura with the local legend that has been built over the years. In 1994, a satanic sect of evil people brutally murdered a young lady at the hotel location. Since then, according to testimonies, her soul wanders there. Other people who have wandered there have disappeared. With the camera in hand, the two friends will try to prove the truth.
title: Paranormal Activity : Greece
